comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Police Sgt. Herbert Coleman displays a 3 1/2-foot alligator found by Mrs. Mary S. Yarborough of 658 W. Call St., in a vacant lot she was cleaning. Coleman said this was the second alligator-finding call he had answered in 16 years."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
